title: Gyakkyou Burai Kaiji: Hakairoku-hen (Kaiji: Against All Rules)
synopsis: Owing to an increasing debt, Kaiji Itou ends up resuming his old lifestyle. One day, while walking on the street, he stumbles upon Yuuji Endou, who is hunting Kaiji due to the money he owes to the Teiai Group. Unaware of this, Kaiji eagerly follows Endou, hoping for a chance to participate in another gamble, but soon finds out the loan shark's real intentions when he is kidnapped.
related_anime: ['Tobaku Hakairoku Kaiji', 'Gyakkyou Burai Kaiji: Ultimate Survivor']
